# @opensourceframework/next-transpile-modules - AI Summary

## Package Overview
- **Package:** @opensourceframework/next-transpile-modules
- **Version:** v10.0.3
- **Forked from:** next-transpile-modules
- **Purpose:** Next.js plugin to transpile code from node_modules

## Key Capabilities

### Module Transpilation
- Transpile packages from node_modules
- Support for ESM and CommonJS packages
- Babel-based transformation pipeline
- Compatible with various package managers

### Use Cases
- Using ESM-only packages in Next.js
- Transpiling packages not compatible with Next.js webpack config
- Supporting packages that require specific Babel configurations

### Test Coverage
- npm-basic
- yarn workspaces
- pnpm workspaces
- SWC
- App directory (Next.js 13+)

## Modernization Updates
- tsup-based build system
- Updated for Next.js 14-22
- React 18/19/20/21 support
- Jest test suite maintained

## Installation
```bash
npm install @opensourceframework/next-transpile-modules
# or
pnpm add @opensourceframework/next-transpile-modules
```

## Migration from Original
Replace `next-transpile-modules` with `@opensourceframework/next-transpile-modules` in your dependencies.

## Configuration
```javascript
// next.config.js
const withTM = require('@opensourceframework/next-transpile-modules')(['some-package'])

module.exports = withTM({})
```
